list_definition.definition: a valuable, hard, round object formed by oysters and several other shellfish

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The necklace consists of three strings of pearls

list_ex_of_english: We have to make sure in the hours that follow that we do not cast too many pearls before swine.

However, the necklace is on somebody's neck, so you cannot reverse the order of the pearls.
I want to quote a couple of his pearls of wisdom.

You are holding a necklace in your hands, composed of no fewer than thirteen exquisite pearls.

The second kind of pearls have a totally different origin.
